Stop.name: linear-acceptance-criteria-validation
Stop.description: Validates completed work against Linear issue acceptance criteria for any issues mentioned in the conversation

args: const fs = require('fs'); const issuePattern = /\b[A-Z]{2,10}-\d+\b/g; const context = process.argv.slice(1).join(' '); const issues = [...new Set(context.match(issuePattern) || [])]; if (issues.length === 0) { console.log('No Linear issues found in context'); process.exit(0); } console.log('Found Linear issues:', issues.join(', ')); console.log('\n⚠️  VALIDATION REQUIRED'); console.log('Before stopping, please validate each issue:'); issues.forEach(issue => { console.log(`  - Use MCP to fetch ${issue} details`); console.log(`  - Review acceptance criteria and requirements`); console.log(`  - Confirm all criteria are met`); }); console.log('\nAsk Claude: "Validate that all acceptance criteria for ' + issues.join(', ') + ' are met"');
